thread.title: History-making Emmy-winner Viola Davis does not want to be put in a box as an actor
thread.title_full: History-making Emmy-winner Viola Davis does not want to be put in a box as an actor

title: History-making Emmy-winner Viola Davis does not want to be put in a box as an actor
text:
History-making Emmy-winner Viola Davis does not want to be 'put in a box' as an actor 
Irish Examiner Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Emmy-winner Viola Davis said that she does not want to be ';put in a box'; as an actor. 
The How To Get Away With Murder actress made history earlier this year as the first African American woman to win an Emmy for best actress for her role in the drama series, but she said she enjoyed not feeling constrained by her character, Annalise Keating, on the show. 
...
